backend/main.mo: Motoko actor that includes blob storage mixin and exposes a `getQuotes` query returning a hardcoded array of two philosophy quotes.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping two features (browsable quotes frontend and bold visual theme) to their implementing files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing one-sentence summaries of each frontend source file for build planning reference.
frontend/index.css: Base Tailwind CSS file defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties using OKLCH color values for a neutral shadcn-style design system.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point titled 'Cash's Famous Philosophy' that mounts the React app into a root div and loads the main TSX module.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component that renders QuotesPage with a styled footer showing copyright year and a caffeine.ai attribution link with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCard.tsx: Quote card component that displays a single quote with rotating wobble transforms, decorative quotation marks, an accent symbol, a numbered badge, and a fade-in-up animation.
frontend/src/components/QuoteCardSkeleto: Loading skeleton placeholder that mimics the QuoteCard layout using muted Skeleton blocks while quotes are being fetched.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React Query hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor, using the current Internet Identity if authenticated, and invalidates dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context provider and hook for Internet Identity authentication, managing AuthClient lifecycle, login/logout, and exposing identity and login status to the component tree.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: React Query hook `useGetQuotes` that fetches the philosophy quotes array from the backend actor via `getQuotes()` with a 5-minute stale time.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet importing Zilla Slab and Caveat fonts, defining a warm earthy OKLCH color palette, and adding utility classes for card wobble transforms, text shadows, and amber glow effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React app entry point that wraps the App component with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before mounting to the DOM.
frontend/src/pages/QuotesPage.tsx: React page component that fetches and displays Cash's philosophy quotes in a styled grid using QuoteCard components, with loading skeletons, error states, and a hero banner section.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts (Zilla Slab, Caveat), an oklch-based color palette with warm espresso/cream/amber tones, and extended border radius and plugin settings.
project_state.json: Project state metadata describing the 'Cash's Famous Philosophy' app, its existing features (quote browsing UI and visual theme), pending feature requests (backend quote storage and seeding), and architectural notes.
